title: Birthday Meditation - A Special Gift (20m 1s) - Aura
description: Celebrate your birthday with a guided meditation to set intentions for the new year and manifest your desires. A special gift for a beautiful soul!
cleaned_text: Birthday meditajton I trust myself and the universe. I wish for balance in all things, with positivity. I am enhancing my capacity for love. Every moment is a chance to begin a new cycle. I love myself. I am a good person. I was put on this earth, in this body, with these people, to fulfill a sacred mission.
